TextView.android:text: 1. THE MISSION PLANNER AIDS USERS TO PLAN UAV MISSIONS AS PER THEIR REQUIREMENTS.
2. THIS APPLICATION DOES NOT INTEND TO REPLACE THE FUNCTIONALITIES OF THE DJI GS PRO APPLICATION BUT ACTS AS AN EXTENSION TO THE APPLICATION
3. ENSURE THE DJI GS PRO APPLICATION IS AVAILABLE WITH YOU WHEN USING THIS APPLICATION TO GENERATE EFFICIENT FLIGHT PLANS
4. THIS PAGE OF THE APPLICATION AIDS USERS TO PLAN A UAV MISSION TO MAP OUT A ROOF OF A STRUCTURE BASED ON THEIR REQUIREMENTS OF IMAGE GSD AND OVERLAP
5. THE PLANNING PROCESS CONSISTS OF 6 STEPS. FOLLOW THE PROVIDED STEPS TO PLAN REQUIRED MISSIONS.
1.ON THE DJI GS PRO APPLICATION, DRAW THE REQUIRED BOUNDARY LINES AROUND THE REGION OF INTEREST.
2.ENSURE THE ROOF LIES AT THE CENTER OF THE BOUNDARY AND BOUNDARY ALSO COVERS REGIONS OF THE GROUND AROUND THE REGION OF INTEREST.
3.ADJUST THE COURSE ANGLE VALUE ON THE APPLICATION SUCH THAT IT IS PARALLEL TO EITHER ONE OF THE SIDES OF THE BOUNDARY

Note: Calculations using revised formulas from Pix4D Manual [1]
THE CALCULATED VALUE OF GSD (OR ALTITUDE) AND OVERLAP IS ENTERED INTO THE APPLICATION IN THEIR RESPECTIVE FIELDS
1.ENTER ALL THE INPUTS, CALCULATED AND MENTIONED IN THE PREVIOUS STEPS, INTO DJI GS PRO APPLICATION

2.IF THE APPLICATION SWITCHES THE MODE OF CAPTURE TO HOVER AND CAPTURE VISIT THE CAMERA PAGE AND SEARCH FOR ACCEPTABLE COMBINATIONS OF GSD. OVERLAP AND TRIGGERING INTERVAL USING THE SURFACE PLOT AND, REPLAN THE MISSIONS.
3. IF THE CALCULATED VALUE OF FLIGHT TIME IS UNACCEPTABLE CHANGE THE REQUIRED OVERLAP OR GSD VALUES IN THE STEPS ABOVE AND REPLAN THE MISSION AGAIN
4. IF THE ALL THE PARAMETERS AND CALCULATED FLIGHT PLANS MEET THE REQUIREMENTS, CLICK THE SAVE BUTTON TO GENERATE THE FLIGHT PLAN REPORT.
